-- | A proof-of-concept Haskell to WebAssembly compiler.
--   
--   A proof-of-concept Haskell to WebAssembly compiler.
@package puellascript
@version 0.0.1

module GHC.Orphans
instance GHC.Show.Show Cmm.Section
instance (GHC.Show.Show d, GHC.Show.Show h, GHC.Show.Show g) => GHC.Show.Show (Cmm.GenCmmDecl d h g)
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmExpr.CmmLit
instance GHC.Show.Show Cmm.CmmStatic
instance GHC.Show.Show Cmm.CmmStatics
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmNode.CmmTickScope
instance GHC.Show.Show Module.Module
instance GHC.Show.Show CostCentre.IsCafCC
instance GHC.Show.Show CostCentre.CostCentre
instance GHC.Show.Show id => GHC.Show.Show (CoreSyn.Tickish id)
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmExpr.LocalReg
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmExpr.CmmReg
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmExpr.Area
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmExpr.CmmExpr
instance GHC.Show.Show ForeignCall.CCallConv
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmType.ForeignHint
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmNode.CmmReturnInfo
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmNode.ForeignConvention
instance GHC.Show.Show CmmNode.ForeignTarget
instance (GHC.Show.Show e, GHC.Show.Show x) => GHC.Show.Show (CmmNode.CmmNode e x)
instance GHC.Show.Show Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C
instance GHC.Show.Show Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O
instance (GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O), GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O), GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C), GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C)) => GHC.Show.Show (Compiler.Hoopl.Block.Block n e x)
instance GHC.Show.Show t => GHC.Show.Show (Compiler.Hoopl.Block.MaybeO ex t)
instance (GHC.Show.Show (block n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O), GHC.Show.Show (block n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O), GHC.Show.Show (block n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C), GHC.Show.Show (block n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C)) => GHC.Show.Show (Compiler.Hoopl.Graph.Graph' block n e x)
instance (GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O), GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O), GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.O Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C), GHC.Show.Show (n Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C Compiler.Hoopl.Block.C)) => GHC.Show.Show (Cmm.GenCmmGraph n)
instance GHC.Show.Show SMRep.ArgDescr
instance GHC.Show.Show SMRep.ClosureTypeInfo
instance GHC.Show.Show SMRep.SMRep
instance GHC.Show.Show Cmm.ProfilingInfo

instance GHC.Show.Show Cmm.CmmInfoTable

instance GHC.Show.Show Cmm.CmmTopInfo
instance GHC.Show.Show BasicTypes.FunctionOrData
instance (GHC.Show.Show tyvar, GHC.Show.Show argf) => GHC.Show.Show (Var.TyVarBndr tyvar argf)
instance GHC.Show.Show Var.ArgFlag
instance GHC.Show.Show TyCoRep.TyLit
instance GHC.Show.Show TyCoRep.Type
instance GHC.Show.Show Literal.Literal

instance GHC.Show.Show PrimOp.PrimOp
instance GHC.Show.Show PrimOp.PrimCall

instance GHC.Show.Show StgSyn.AltType
instance GHC.Show.Show CoreSyn.AltCon
instance (GHC.Show.Show bndr, GHC.Show.Show occ) => GHC.Show.Show (StgSyn.GenStgExpr bndr occ)
instance GHC.Show.Show StgSyn.UpdateFlag
instance (GHC.Show.Show bndr, GHC.Show.Show occ) => GHC.Show.Show (StgSyn.GenStgRhs bndr occ)
instance (GHC.Show.Show bndr, GHC.Show.Show occ) => GHC.Show.Show (StgSyn.GenStgBinding bndr occ)
instance (GHC.Show.Show bndr, GHC.Show.Show occ) => GHC.Show.Show (StgSyn.GenStgTopBinding bndr occ)
instance GHC.Show.Show b => GHC.Show.Show (CoreSyn.Expr b)
instance GHC.Show.Show b => GHC.Show.Show (CoreSyn.Bind b)

instance GHC.Show.Show CostCentre.CostCentreStack

instance GHC.Show.Show (GHCi.RemoteTypes.ForeignRef a)
instance GHC.Show.Show OccName.OccName

module Language.PuellaScript.Compiler.Flags
data Flags
Flags :: [FilePath] -> [String] -> FatalMessager -> LogAction -> (ModSummary -> CgGuts -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> CoreProgram -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> Stream IO RawCmmGroup () -> IO ()) -> Flags
[importPaths] :: Flags -> [FilePath]
[targets] :: Flags -> [String]
[fatalMessager] :: Flags -> FatalMessager
[logAction] :: Flags -> LogAction
[coreHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> CgGuts -> IO ()
[corePrepHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> CoreProgram -> IO ()
[stgFromCoreHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()
[stgHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()
[cmmFromStgHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()
[cmmHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()
[cmmRawHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> Stream IO RawCmmGroup () -> IO ()
defaultFlags :: Flags

module Language.PuellaScript.Compiler.Run
run :: Flags -> IO ()
